title: Vibration Alert Investigation
instructions: Inspect and realign shaft bearings. Tighten all mounts and test post-alignment.
observations: Vibration exceeded 1.9 mm/s. Bearing misalignment suspected.

title: High Temperature Fault – Tool Check
instructions: Visually inspect cutting tool. Replace if signs of wear are found.
observations: Temperatures exceeded 70°C. Coolant flow was adequate.

title: Vibration Sensor False Trigger Review
instructions: Check sensor mount and wiring. Test during cold and warm starts.
observations: Alert only occurred during startup phase. No mechanical faults found.

title: Coolant Blockage Troubleshooting
instructions: Inspect all coolant lines. Replace flexible tubing and test flow.
observations: Repeated high-temp alerts. Tubing found kinked under high RPM load.

title: Monthly Mechanical Balancing
instructions: Inspect impeller and rotating parts. Perform balancing procedure.
observations: Previous run showed rising vibration trend. Balancing improved stability.

title: Lubrication System Inspection
instructions: Check lubrication lines and pump. Refill and flush if needed.
observations: Lubrication pump running intermittently. Caused overheating of bearings.

title: Sensor Calibration Routine
instructions: Calibrate thermal and vibration sensors. Verify against reference readings.
observations: Vibration sensor drifted over time. Readings were 0.2 mm/s too high.

title: Training Follow-up Inspection
instructions: Supervise inspection by trainees on impeller and vibration source.
observations: Trainees correctly identified buildup on impeller blade.

title: High-Load Operation Vibration Review
instructions: Run M1 under max load. Monitor vibration trends across full cycle.
observations: No fault found; vibration remains high but within expected limits under full load.

title: Coolant Flow Validation
instructions: Test coolant flow across all RPM ranges. Ensure no dynamic blockage.
observations: Coolant stable at low RPM but drops off at high load. Tube replacement resolved issue.
